title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 13 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 13 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: A wise son heareth his father's instruction: but a scorner heareth not rebuke.
lineList.cn: 智慧子听父亲的教训。亵慢人不听责备。

lineList.en: A man shall eat good by the fruit of his mouth: but the soul of the transgressors shall eat violence.
lineList.cn: 人因口所结的果子，必享美福。奸诈人必遭强暴。

lineList.en: He that keepeth his mouth keepeth his life: but he that openeth wide his lips shall have destruction.
lineList.cn: 谨守口的，得保生命。大张嘴的，必致败亡。

lineList.en: The soul of the sluggard desireth, and hath nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be made fat.
lineList.cn: 懒惰人羡慕，却无所得。殷勤人必得丰裕。

lineList.en: A righteous man hateth lying: but a wicked man is loathsome, and cometh to shame.
lineList.cn: 义人恨恶谎言。恶人有臭名，且致惭愧。

lineList.en: Righteousness keepeth him that is upright in the way: but wickedness overthroweth the sinner.
lineList.cn: 行为正直的，有公义保守。犯罪的被邪恶倾覆。

lineList.en: There is that maketh himself rich, yet hath nothing: there is that maketh himself poor, yet hath great riches.
lineList.cn: 假作富足的，却一无所有。装作穷乏的，却广有财物。

lineList.en: The ransom of a man's life are his riches: but the poor heareth not rebuke.
lineList.cn: 人的赀财，是他生命的赎价。穷乏人却听不见威吓的话。

lineList.en: The light of the righteous rejoiceth: but the lamp of the wicked shall be put out.
lineList.cn: 义人的光明亮。（明亮原文作喜欢）恶人的灯要熄灭。

lineList.en: Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised is wisdom.
lineList.cn: 骄傲只启争竞。听劝言的，却有智慧。

lineList.en: Wealth gotten by vanity shall be diminished: but he that gathereth by labour shall increase.
lineList.cn: 不劳而得之财，必然消耗。勤劳积蓄的，必见加增。

lineList.en: Hope deferred maketh the heart sick: but when the desire cometh, it is a tree of life.
lineList.cn: 所盼望的迟延未得，令人心忧。所愿意的临到，却是生命树。

lineList.en: Whoso despiseth the word shall be destroyed: but he that feareth the commandment shall be rewarded.
lineList.cn: 藐视训言的，自取灭亡。敬畏诫命的，必得善报。

lineList.en: The law of the wise is a fountain of life, to depart from the snares of death.
lineList.cn: 智慧人的法则，（或作指教）是生命的泉源，可以使人离开死亡的网罗。

lineList.en: Good understanding giveth favour: but the way of transgressors is hard.
lineList.cn: 美好的聪明，使人蒙恩。奸诈人的道路，崎岖难行。

lineList.en: Every prudent man dealeth with knowledge: but a fool layeth open his folly.
lineList.cn: 凡通达人都凭知识行事。愚昧人张扬自己的愚昧。

lineList.en: A wicked messenger falleth into mischief: but a faithful ambassador is health.
lineList.cn: 奸恶的使者，必陷在祸患里。忠信的使臣，乃医人的良药。

lineList.en: Poverty and shame shall be to him that refuseth instruction: but he that regardeth reproof shall be honoured.
lineList.cn: 弃绝教管的，必致贫受辱。领受责备的，必得尊荣。

lineList.en: The desire accomplished is sweet to the soul: but it is abomination to fools to depart from evil.
lineList.cn: 所欲的成就，心觉甘甜。远离恶事，为愚昧人所憎恶。

lineList.en: He that walketh with wise men shall be wise: but a companion of fools shall be destroyed.
lineList.cn: 与智慧人同行的，必得智慧。和愚昧人作伴的，必受亏损。

lineList.en: Evil pursueth sinners: but to the righteous good shall be repayed.
lineList.cn: 祸患追赶罪人。义人必得善报。

lineList.en: A good man leaveth an inheritance to his children's children: and the wealth of the sinner is laid up for the just.
lineList.cn: 善人给子孙遗留产业。罪人为义人积存赀财。

lineList.en: Much food is in the tillage of the poor: but there is that is destroyed for want of judgment.
lineList.cn: 穷人耕种多得粮食，但因不义有消灭的。

lineList.en: He that spareth his rod hateth his son: but he that loveth him chasteneth him betimes.
lineList.cn: 不忍用杖打儿子的，是恨恶他。疼爱儿子的，随时管教。

lineList.en: The righteous eateth to the satisfying of his soul: but the belly of the wicked shall want.
lineList.cn: 义人吃得饱足。恶人肚腹缺粮。
